sentences.sentence: All the year round is torridity here.
Torridity, humidity, raininess are the major climatic characteristics of the YunNan hot-moist area.
sentences.translation: 炎热、潮湿、多雨是云南湿热地区的主要气候特征。

sentences.sentence: The results indicate that during the torridity summer natural ventilation can not satisfied the temperature requirement in greenhouse, so it is necessary to use the mechanical ventilation.
sentences.translation: 本文的研究结果表明，炎热的夏天，自然通风不能满足温室中温度的要求，配合湿帘使用机械通风非常必要。
